description: Check if a suitability assessment is mentioned.
prompt_instructions: Analyze the investment proposal text provided below.
Look for statements indicating that a suitability assessment or report has been performed or is referenced (e.g., 'Based on your profile', 'suitability report', 'aligned with your objectives').
Respond with 'Suitability Mentioned: Yes' if such statements are found.
Respond with 'Suitability Mentioned: No' if no such statements are found.
